Contextual Information:

UPL's board meeting on May 12, 2025 was set to consider approving the yearly financial results and dividend.

UPL had previously announced that Advanta Seeds acquired key corn assets from K-Adriatica on June 2, 2025 to strengthen its European portfolio.

UPL conducted its "Tenth Annual Sarus Crane Count" on June 21, 2025.
